titleStmt.title: Physical rarities containing the most choice receipts of physick, and chyrurgerie, for the cure of all diseases incident to mans body. Being a rich jewell, kept in the cabinet of a famous doctor in this nation; stored with admirable secrets, and approved medicines. Published by Ralph Williams, practitioner in physick and chyrurgerie.
titleStmt.author: Williams, Ralph.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for J.M. and are to be sold by George Calvert, at the half Moon in Watling-street neer S. Austins Gate,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the half Moon in Watling-street neer S. Austins Gate
